statements: SELECT * FROM voice_recordings
SELECT recording_id, recording_date, call_id FROM voice_recordings
SELECT recording_id, call_id FROM voice_recordings ORDER BY recording_date DESC
SELECT * FROM voice_recordings WHERE call_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
SELECT recording_id, recording_date FROM voice_recordings WHERE recording_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM voice_recordings ORDER BY recording_date DESC, call_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT recording_id, call_id, recording_date FROM voice_recordings WHERE recording_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY recording_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT recording_id, LENGTH(recording_data) AS data_size FROM voice_recordings WHERE LENGTH(recording_data) > 1000
SELECT DISTINCT call_id FROM voice_recordings ORDER BY call_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(recording_id) AS total_recordings FROM voice_recordings WHERE recording_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM voice_recordings;
SELECT recording_url, duration_seconds FROM voice_recordings WHERE call_id = 123;
SELECT caller_name, agent_id FROM call_details WHERE call_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM call_details ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT recording_url, duration_seconds FROM voice_recordings JOIN call_details ON voice_recordings.call_id = call_details.call_id;
SELECT * FROM voice_recordings WHERE duration_seconds > 60;
SELECT caller_name, date_time FROM call_details ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT recording_url FROM voice_recordings WHERE call_id = 1001;
SELECT COUNT(recording_id) AS total_recordings FROM voice_recordings;
SELECT vr.recording_url, cd.caller_name FROM voice_recordings vr JOIN call_details cd ON vr.call_id = cd.call_id;
SELECT * FROM support_calls;
SELECT caller_id, timestamp, duration FROM support_calls WHERE duration > 300;
SELECT name, phone_number, email FROM callers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT agent_id, name, department, hire_date FROM agents WHERE hire_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, caller_id, agent_id, timestamp FROM support_calls ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, caller_id, agent_id, timestamp FROM support_calls WHERE duration > 300 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, email FROM callers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT name, department, hire_date FROM agents WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, caller_id, agent_id, timestamp FROM support_calls WHERE agent_id = 3 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM callers ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM support_calls;
SELECT caller_id, agent_id FROM support_calls WHERE duration > '3 hours';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents WHERE agent_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT call_id, feedback_text FROM call_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM support_calls WHERE duration > '00:30:00';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents WHERE agent_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM call_feedback WHERE call_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM support_calls JOIN agents ON support_calls.agent_id = agents.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM support_calls WHERE call_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT agent_name FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT agent_id, call_datetime FROM agent_calls WHERE agent_id = 3 ORDER BY call_datetime ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_comment FROM call_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_calls ORDER BY call_datetime DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, count(*) FROM agent_calls GROUP BY customer_id HAVING count(*) > 1
SELECT call_id, customer_name, call_datetime FROM agent_calls JOIN customers ON agent_calls.call_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT agent_name, avg(call_duration) as avg_duration FROM agents JOIN agent_calls ON agents.agent_id = agent_calls.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name

SELECT a.agent_name, COUNT(*) as total_calls, SUM(c.rating) as total_rating FROM agents a JOIN agent_calls ac ON a.agent_id = ac.agent_id JOIN call_feedback c ON ac.call_id = c.call_id GROUP BY a.agent_name ORDER BY total_rating DESC
